channel.title: Konfabulator Unix Utils
channel.description: I've been a keen user of Konfabulator for a while now. I even paid for a couple of licenses in the pre-Yahoo days. It's really easy to hack up your own widgets, and I have a strange self-distructive streak that...
channel.dc:creator: Martin
